metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10184 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: undertow before version 2.0.23.Final is vulnerable to an information leak issue. Web apps may have their directory structures predicted through requests without trailing slashes via the api.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
